mapper.select: /* getBoardList :: 게시글 리스트 조회 */ SELECT a.BOARD_SSN, a.TITLE, a.CONTENTS, a.ATT_FILE , a.U_NAME, a.REG_ID AS ID, a.REG_DT_YMD, a.HASH_TAG, a.SCRAPS, COUNT(a.SEQ) AS COMMENTS FROM( SELECT b.BOARD_SSN , b.TITLE, b.CONTENTS, b.ATT_FILE, b.U_NAME, b.REG_ID, b.HASH_TAG, c.SEQ , DATE_FORMAT(b.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT_YMD, COUNT(s.SCRAP_NO) AS SCRAPS FROM bboom_board b LEFT JOIN board_comment c ON b.BOARD_SSN=c.LINK_SEQ LEFT JOIN board_scrap s ON b.BOARD_SSN=s.LINK_SEQ GROUP BY b.BOARD_SSN, b.TITLE, b.CONTENTS, b.ATT_FILE, b.U_NAME, b.REG_ID, b.REG_DT, b.HASH_TAG, c.SEQ )a WHERE U_NAME= #{uName} GROUP BY a.BOARD_SSN, a.TITLE, a.CONTENTS, a.ATT_FILE, a.U_NAME, a.REG_ID, a.REG_DT_YMD, a.SCRAPS, a.HASH_TAG

/* getCommentList :: 댓글 리스트 조회 */ SELECT c.LINK_SEQ, c.`CONTENTS`, c.REG_NM, c.REG_DT, c.SEQ ,b.BOARD_SSN, b.U_NAME, b.TITLE , DATE_FORMAT(c.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT_YMD , SUBSTR(b.TITLE, 1, 20) AS TITLE20 FROM board_comment AS c LEFT JOIN bboom_board AS b ON c.LINK_SEQ = b.BOARD_SSN WHERE REG_NM= #{regNm}
